dcterms:creator: Youngchan Kim
Wonjoon Jin
Sunghyun Cho
Seung-Hwan Baek
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of 2,022 trichromatic Stokes images covering a variety of natural indoor and outdoor scenes, annotated with parameters such as environment type, illumination conditions, timestamp, and scene categorization.
dcterms:title: Trichromatic Stokes Dataset

dcterms:creator: Youngchan Kim
Wonjoon Jin
Sunghyun Cho
Seung-Hwan Baek
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 311 hyperspectral Stokes images across 21 spectral channels, featuring a diverse range of natural indoor and outdoor scenes, annotated with parameters such as environment type, illumination conditions, timestamp, and scene categorization.
dcterms:title: Hyperspectral Stokes Dataset
